ygData.subject: Re: Fight
ygData.msgSnippet: GRRR!!! One dang carride from school, and 3 F ing acidents to hold me up! Guess Friday the 13th is unlucky after all. I don t like these moding accusations

GRRR!!! One dang carride from school, and 3 F'ing acidents to hold me up! 
Guess Friday the 13th is unlucky after all.

I don't like these moding accusations that are going on. Surge can eat rubber 
if he wants to (some bots can resist pain, as can some humans), and I don't 
see how HotRod moded. So both of you stop accusing each other. This is an IC 
fight, not an OOC one. I will back neither up, in fact I will tell both of 
you to shut up. THe next one to accuse the other one of moding (whether over 
the RPG or complaining to me personally) gets moderated for the battle. I am 
not in a good mood, so don't try me.

And quit threatening each other too.

::Zardus/Bloodystrike/The Oblitercons/Havoc::

Flying in closer to Deemos, Zardus continues firing his plasma launcher, 
firing at the bot's chest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing the battle between Surge and HotRod, Bloodystrike flies toward Surge, 
once again taking out his rifle.

He takes carefull aim, firing two missiles at Surge's back.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Pyro laughs as bullets hit his armor, making a few dents and scratches, but 
nothing major. He drives at Gigas, firing at him as he shoots fireballs at 
the bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Spinning in midair, Dark One manages to avoid most of the shots, a few 
hitting him as he continues flying toward Horn Drill and firing at him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scavanger shakes as shots hit him, the Oblitertron transforming into robot 
mode and dodging some more bullets, returning fire with his rifle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Breakdown continues to ride at Grenade, ignoring the shots hitting him as he 
fires two more missiles, again at Grenade.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hiss dives behind a tree, shots sailing over his head. The tree falls, nearly 
hitting Hiss as the Oblitercon returns fire, shooting at Shockaract.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Soon yes," Havoc replies to Demolition, diving out of the way of some shots. 
He pulls up, nearly hitting the ground as he sails over Shockaract's head, 
gropping a bomb on the bot, "But not yet. We'll do some damage first."
